summary: A thrilling story spanning 48 hours of five individuals linked by hate and fear but brought together by fate to finally recognize each other.
cast: John Abraham|Arshad Warsi|Salman Shahid|Hanif Hum Ghum|Linda Arsenio|Wali-o Qhab|Khader Arya|Haji Gul Aser|Abdul Basir Mujahid|Saeed Meeran Farhad|Raziq Zargar|Farooq Baraki|Anjamuddin|Hashmatullah Fanai|Sunil Godse|Shaikh Nasiruddin|Captain Diwekar|Porter Barron|Hallam Ferguson|Diego Etcheto|Tim Albone|Hameed|Alahaj Syed Abdul Quddus|Ghulam Hajdar Ahmadi|Rasool Eman|Abdul Agha|Rokai Bakhshy|Ashwin Dhar|Zaki Intezar|Zilgai|Bismillah|Toryalai Mohammad|Syed Anwar|Abdul Wahid|Mohammad Qasim|Amardeep Galsin|Yalda Khalili|Roshan Seth|Hassan Rashid|Brian Dawson
title: Kabul Express
